item.description:
lets try to pull this together with short notice. it looks like a great event.
lets meet just in front of the aquarium at the central wharf building right out front.
REMEMBER TO BRING A TRIPOD

Sail Boston, Inc., in conjunction with Conventures, Inc., is proud to invite you to Boston’s Waterfront to watch the 2010 Boston Harbor Parade of Lights!

The parade will feature over 30 brightly lit vessels cruising around Boston Harbor. Public viewing will be available all along the waterfront, with the best viewing areas being Castle Island and Fan Pier. Awards will be given for “Best Entertainment”, “Most Creative” and “Best Decorated”.


http://www.sailboston...
item.name: Boston Harbor Parade of Lights
